Microfibre push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elastic straps at the back and hook-and-eye fasteners.

Block-coloured tri suit in fast-drying functional fabric in a narrow cut at the top. Deep neckline at the back with a horizontal elastic strap across the top.

Playsuit in a soft viscose and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck, concealed fastening at the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets, welt back pockets and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jacket in washed, hard-worn denim with a hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Drawstring hood, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and ribbed cuffs.
Short shorts in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with an elasticated waist and tie at the front. Side pockets and wide ribbing at the waist for best fit.
